description: This tool comprises PowerShell scripts specifically designed to address issues related to the Windows Recovery Environment (WinRE) updates. The scripts provide functionality to diagnose and fix problems encountered during the update process for the particular vulnerabilities identified under CVE-2024-20666 and KB5034441. It enables system administrators to automate the troubleshooting of WinRE by leveraging command-line capabilities inherent in PowerShell. Users can access the tool through the provided link for instructions on how to implement the scripts effectively in their environment. The detailed explanation for this Tool is provided in the Fix description.
